mapper.sql: SELECT t1.`acl`, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ZT_BUG WHERE PRODUCT = t1.`id` AND `STATUS` = 'active' AND DELETED = '0' ) AS `activebugcnt`, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ZT_STORY WHERE PRODUCT = t1.`id` AND `STATUS`='active' AND DELETED = '0' and ZT_STORY.SRFDCID = t1.SRFDCID) AS `activestorycnt`, (select count(1) from zt_build t where t.product = t1.id and t.deleted = '0' ) AS `buildcnt`, (select count(1) from zt_case t where t.product = t1.id and t.deleted = '0' ) AS `casecnt`, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ZT_STORY WHERE PRODUCT = t1.`id` AND `STATUS`='changed' AND DELETED = '0' and ZT_STORY.SRFDCID = t1.SRFDCID) AS `changedstorycnt`, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ZT_STORY WHERE PRODUCT = t1.`id` AND `STATUS`='closed' AND DELETED = '0' and ZT_STORY.SRFDCID = t1.SRFDCID) AS `closedstorycnt`, t1.`code`, t1.`createdby`, t1.`createddate`, t1.`createdversion`, t1.`createman`, t1.`deleted`, t1.`desc`, (select count(1) from zt_doc t where t.product = t1.id and t.deleted = '0' and t.SRFDCID = t1.SRFDCID) AS `doccnt`, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ZT_STORY WHERE PRODUCT = t1.`id` AND `STATUS`='draft' AND DELETED = '0' and ZT_STORY.SRFDCID = t1.SRFDCID) AS `draftstorycnt`, t1.`ibiz_id`, t1.`id`, '0' AS `istop`, t1.`line`, t11.`NAME` AS `linename`, t1.`mdeptid`, t1.`mdeptname`, t1.`name`, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ZT_BUG WHERE PRODUCT = t1.`id` AND `STATUS` <> 'closed' AND DELETED = '0' and ZT_BUG.SRFDCID = t1.SRFDCID) AS `notclosedbugcnt`, t1.`order`, t1.`order` AS `order1`, t1.`orgid`, t1.`orgname`, t1.`po`, t1.PO AS `popk`, t1.`productclass`, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ZT_PRODUCTPLAN WHERE PRODUCT= t1.`id` AND DELETED = '0' and ZT_PRODUCTPLAN.SRFDCID = t1.SRFDCID) AS `productplancnt`, t1.`productsn`, t1.`qd`, t1.QD AS `qdpk`, t1.`rd`, t1.RD AS `rdpk`, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ZT_BUG WHERE PRODUCT = t1.`id` AND DELETED = '0' and ZT_BUG.SRFDCID = t1.SRFDCID) AS `relatedbugcnt`, (select count(1) from zt_projectproduct t inner join zt_project t2 on t2.id = t.project where t.product = t1.id and t2.deleted = '0' ) AS `relatedprojects`, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ZT_RELEASE WHERE PRODUCT= t1.`id` AND DELETED = '0' and ZT_RELEASE.SRFDCID = t1.SRFDCID) AS `releasecnt`, t1.`status`, t1.`substatus`, t1.`supproreport`, t1.`type`, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ZT_BUG WHERE PRODUCT = t1.`id` AND `CONFIRMED` = 0 AND DELETED = '0' and ZT_BUG.SRFDCID = t1.SRFDCID) AS `unconfirmbugcnt`, t1.`updateby`, t1.`updatedate`, t1.`updateman`, t1.`whitelist` FROM `zt_product` t1 LEFT JOIN `zt_module` t11 ON t1.`line` = t11.`ID`

SELECT t1.`acl`, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ZT_BUG WHERE PRODUCT = t1.`id` AND `STATUS` = 'active' AND DELETED = '0' ) AS `activebugcnt`, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ZT_STORY WHERE PRODUCT = t1.`id` AND `STATUS`='active' AND DELETED = '0' and ZT_STORY.SRFDCID = t1.SRFDCID) AS `activestorycnt`, (select count(1) from zt_build t where t.product = t1.id and t.deleted = '0' ) AS `buildcnt`, (select count(1) from zt_case t where t.product = t1.id and t.deleted = '0' ) AS `casecnt`, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ZT_STORY WHERE PRODUCT = t1.`id` AND `STATUS`='changed' AND DELETED = '0' and ZT_STORY.SRFDCID = t1.SRFDCID) AS `changedstorycnt`, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ZT_STORY WHERE PRODUCT = t1.`id` AND `STATUS`='closed' AND DELETED = '0' and ZT_STORY.SRFDCID = t1.SRFDCID) AS `closedstorycnt`, t1.`code`, t1.`createdby`, t1.`createddate`, t1.`createdversion`, t1.`createman`, t1.`deleted`, (select count(1) from zt_doc t where t.product = t1.id and t.deleted = '0' and t.SRFDCID = t1.SRFDCID) AS `doccnt`, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ZT_STORY WHERE PRODUCT = t1.`id` AND `STATUS`='draft' AND DELETED = '0' and ZT_STORY.SRFDCID = t1.SRFDCID) AS `draftstorycnt`, t1.`ibiz_id`, t1.`id`, '0' AS `istop`, t1.`line`, t11.`NAME` AS `linename`, t1.`mdeptid`, t1.`mdeptname`, t1.`name`, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ZT_BUG WHERE PRODUCT = t1.`id` AND `STATUS` <> 'closed' AND DELETED = '0' and ZT_BUG.SRFDCID = t1.SRFDCID) AS `notclosedbugcnt`, t1.`order`, t1.`order` AS `order1`, t1.`orgid`, t1.`orgname`, t1.`po`, t1.PO AS `popk`, t1.`productclass`, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ZT_PRODUCTPLAN WHERE PRODUCT= t1.`id` AND DELETED = '0' and ZT_PRODUCTPLAN.SRFDCID = t1.SRFDCID) AS `productplancnt`, t1.`productsn`, t1.`qd`, t1.QD AS `qdpk`, t1.`rd`, t1.RD AS `rdpk`, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ZT_BUG WHERE PRODUCT = t1.`id` AND DELETED = '0' and ZT_BUG.SRFDCID = t1.SRFDCID) AS `relatedbugcnt`, (select count(1) from zt_projectproduct t inner join zt_project t2 on t2.id = t.project where t.product = t1.id and t2.deleted = '0' ) AS `relatedprojects`, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ZT_RELEASE WHERE PRODUCT= t1.`id` AND DELETED = '0' and ZT_RELEASE.SRFDCID = t1.SRFDCID) AS `releasecnt`, t1.`status`, t1.`substatus`, t1.`supproreport`, t1.`type`, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ZT_BUG WHERE PRODUCT = t1.`id` AND `CONFIRMED` = 0 AND DELETED = '0' and ZT_BUG.SRFDCID = t1.SRFDCID) AS `unconfirmbugcnt`, t1.`updateby`, t1.`updatedate`, t1.`updateman` FROM `zt_product` t1 LEFT JOIN `zt_module` t11 ON t1.`line` = t11.`ID`
AND t1.deleted = '0'
AND ( ( t1.`status` <> 'closed' OR (#{srf.datacontext.products} is not null and t1.id = #{srf.datacontext.products}) ) )

SELECT id, `name`, `code`, line, type, `status`, subStatus, `desc`, PO, QD, RD, acl, whitelist, createdBy, createdDate, createdVersion, `order`, deleted, IBIZ_ID, ORGID, MDEPTID , productsn FROM zt_product
AND deleted = '0'
SELECT t1.id, t1.productsn FROM `zt_product` t1

SELECT t1.MDEPTID, t1.orgid, t1.`ACL`, ( SELECT COUNT( 1 ) FROM ZT_BUG t WHERE t.DELETED = '0' AND t.PRODUCT = t1.`ID` AND t.`STATUS` = 'active' ) AS `ACTIVEBUGCNT`, ( SELECT COUNT( 1 ) FROM ZT_STORY t WHERE t.DELETED = '0' AND t.PRODUCT = t1.`ID` AND t.`STATUS` = 'active' ) AS `ACTIVESTORYCNT`, t1.`CODE`, t1.`DELETED`, t1.`ID`, t1.`NAME`, (CASE WHEN T2.OBJECTORDER IS NOT NULL THEN T2.OBJECTORDER ELSE t1.`ORDER` END) as `ORDER`, (CASE WHEN T2.OBJECTORDER IS NOT NULL THEN T2.OBJECTORDER ELSE t1.`ORDER` END) as `ORDER1`, (CASE WHEN T2.OBJECTORDER IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as `ISTOP`, ( SELECT COUNT( 1 ) FROM ZT_PRODUCTPLAN t WHERE t.DELETED = '0' AND t.PRODUCT = t1.`ID`) AS `PRODUCTPLANCNT`, ( SELECT COUNT( 1 ) FROM ZT_RELEASE t WHERE t.DELETED = '0' AND t.PRODUCT = t1.`ID`) AS `RELEASECNT`, t1.`STATUS`, ( SELECT COUNT( 1 ) FROM ZT_BUG t WHERE t.DELETED = '0' AND t.PRODUCT = t1.`ID` AND t.`CONFIRMED` = 0 ) AS `UNCONFIRMBUGCNT` , ( SELECT COUNT( 1 ) FROM ZT_BUG t WHERE t.DELETED = '0' AND t.PRODUCT = t1.`ID` AND t.`STATUS` <> 'closed' ) AS `NOTCLOSEDBUGCNT`, t1.`TYPE`, t1.productsn FROM `zt_product` t1 left join t_ibz_top t2 on t1.id = t2.OBJECTID and t2.type = 'product' and t2.ACCOUNT = #{srf.sessioncontext.srfloginname} LEFT JOIN zt_module t11 ON t1.LINE = t11.ID
AND t1.deleted = '0'

SELECT t1.`acl`, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ZT_BUG WHERE PRODUCT = t1.`id` AND `STATUS` = 'active' AND DELETED = '0' ) AS `activebugcnt`, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ZT_STORY WHERE PRODUCT = t1.`id` AND `STATUS`='active' AND DELETED = '0' and ZT_STORY.SRFDCID = t1.SRFDCID) AS `activestorycnt`, (select count(1) from zt_build t where t.product = t1.id and t.deleted = '0' ) AS `buildcnt`, (select count(1) from zt_case t where t.product = t1.id and t.deleted = '0' ) AS `casecnt`, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ZT_STORY WHERE PRODUCT = t1.`id` AND `STATUS`='changed' AND DELETED = '0' and ZT_STORY.SRFDCID = t1.SRFDCID) AS `changedstorycnt`, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ZT_STORY WHERE PRODUCT = t1.`id` AND `STATUS`='closed' AND DELETED = '0' and ZT_STORY.SRFDCID = t1.SRFDCID) AS `closedstorycnt`, t1.`code`, t1.`createdby`, t1.`createddate`, t1.`createdversion`, t1.`createman`, t1.`deleted`, (select count(1) from zt_doc t where t.product = t1.id and t.deleted = '0' and t.SRFDCID = t1.SRFDCID) AS `doccnt`, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ZT_STORY WHERE PRODUCT = t1.`id` AND `STATUS`='draft' AND DELETED = '0' and ZT_STORY.SRFDCID = t1.SRFDCID) AS `draftstorycnt`, t1.`ibiz_id`, t1.`id`, '0' AS `istop`, t1.`line`, t11.`NAME` AS `linename`, t1.`mdeptid`, t1.`mdeptname`, t1.`name`, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ZT_BUG WHERE PRODUCT = t1.`id` AND `STATUS` <> 'closed' AND DELETED = '0' and ZT_BUG.SRFDCID = t1.SRFDCID) AS `notclosedbugcnt`, t1.`order`, t1.`order` AS `order1`, t1.`orgid`, t1.`orgname`, t1.`po`, t1.PO AS `popk`, t1.`productclass`, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ZT_PRODUCTPLAN WHERE PRODUCT= t1.`id` AND DELETED = '0' and ZT_PRODUCTPLAN.SRFDCID = t1.SRFDCID) AS `productplancnt`, t1.`productsn`, t1.`qd`, t1.QD AS `qdpk`, t1.`rd`, t1.RD AS `rdpk`, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ZT_BUG WHERE PRODUCT = t1.`id` AND DELETED = '0' and ZT_BUG.SRFDCID = t1.SRFDCID) AS `relatedbugcnt`, (select count(1) from zt_projectproduct t inner join zt_project t2 on t2.id = t.project where t.product = t1.id and t2.deleted = '0' ) AS `relatedprojects`, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ZT_RELEASE WHERE PRODUCT= t1.`id` AND DELETED = '0' and ZT_RELEASE.SRFDCID = t1.SRFDCID) AS `releasecnt`, t1.`status`, t1.`substatus`, t1.`supproreport`, t1.`type`, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ZT_BUG WHERE PRODUCT = t1.`id` AND `CONFIRMED` = 0 AND DELETED = '0' and ZT_BUG.SRFDCID = t1.SRFDCID) AS `unconfirmbugcnt`, t1.`updateby`, t1.`updatedate`, t1.`updateman` FROM `zt_product` t1 LEFT JOIN `zt_module` t11 ON t1.`line` = t11.`ID`
AND EXISTS(SELECT * FROM `zt_projectproduct` t21 WHERE t1.`id` = t21.`PRODUCT` AND ( t21.`PROJECT` = #{srf.datacontext.srfparentkey} ) )
AND t1.deleted = '0'

SELECT t1.* FROM ( SELECT t1.MDEPTID, t1.orgid, t1.`ACL`, ( SELECT COUNT( 1 ) FROM ZT_BUG WHERE PRODUCT = t1.`ID` AND `STATUS` = 'active' AND DELETED = '0' ) AS `ACTIVEBUGCNT`, ( SELECT COUNT( 1 ) FROM ZT_STORY WHERE PRODUCT = t1.`ID` AND `STATUS` = 'active' AND DELETED = '0' ) AS `ACTIVESTORYCNT`, ( SELECT count( 1 ) FROM zt_build t WHERE t.product = t1.id AND t.deleted = '0' ) AS `BUILDCNT`, ( SELECT count( 1 ) FROM zt_case t WHERE t.product = t1.id AND t.deleted = '0' ) AS `CASECNT`, ( SELECT COUNT( 1 ) FROM ZT_STORY WHERE PRODUCT = t1.`ID` AND `STATUS` = 'changed' AND DELETED = '0' ) AS `CHANGEDSTORYCNT`, ( SELECT COUNT( 1 ) FROM ZT_STORY WHERE PRODUCT = t1.`ID` AND `STATUS` = 'closed' AND DELETED = '0' ) AS `CLOSEDSTORYCNT`, t1.`CODE`, t1.`CREATEDBY`, t1.`CREATEDDATE`, t1.`CREATEDVERSION`, t1.`DELETED`, ( SELECT count( 1 ) FROM zt_doc t WHERE t.product = t1.id AND t.deleted = '0' ) AS `DOCCNT`, ( SELECT COUNT( 1 ) FROM ZT_STORY WHERE PRODUCT = t1.`ID` AND `STATUS` = 'draft' AND DELETED = '0' ) AS `DRAFTSTORYCNT`, t1.`ID`, t1.`LINE`, t11.`NAME` AS `LINENAME`, t1.`NAME`, ( SELECT COUNT( 1 ) FROM ZT_BUG WHERE PRODUCT = t1.`ID` AND `STATUS` <> 'closed' AND DELETED = '0' ) AS `NOTCLOSEDBUGCNT`, t1.`ORDER`, (CASE WHEN T2.OBJECTORDER IS NOT NULL THEN T2.OBJECTORDER ELSE t1.`ORDER` END) as `ORDER1`, (CASE WHEN T2.OBJECTORDER IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as `ISTOP`, t1.`PO`, ( SELECT COUNT( 1 ) FROM ZT_PRODUCTPLAN WHERE PRODUCT = t1.`ID` AND DELETED = '0' ) AS `PRODUCTPLANCNT`, t1.`QD`, t1.`RD`, ( SELECT COUNT( 1 ) FROM ZT_BUG WHERE PRODUCT = t1.`ID` AND DELETED = '0' ) AS `RELATEDBUGCNT`, ( SELECT count( 1 ) FROM zt_projectproduct t INNER JOIN zt_project t2 ON t2.id = t.project WHERE t.product = t1.id AND t2.deleted = '0' ) AS `RELATEDPROJECTS`, ( SELECT COUNT( 1 ) FROM ZT_RELEASE WHERE PRODUCT = t1.`ID` AND DELETED = '0' ) AS `RELEASECNT`, t1.`STATUS`, t1.`SUBSTATUS`, t1.`TYPE`, ( SELECT COUNT( 1 ) FROM ZT_BUG WHERE PRODUCT = t1.`ID` AND `CONFIRMED` = 0 AND DELETED = '0' ) AS `UNCONFIRMBUGCNT` , t1.productsn FROM `zt_product` t1 left join t_ibz_top t2 on t1.id = t2.OBJECTID and t2.type = 'product' and t2.ACCOUNT = #{srf.sessioncontext.srfloginname} LEFT JOIN zt_module t11 ON t1.LINE = t11.ID WHERE t1.deleted = '0' AND (t1.acl = 'open' or t1.CREATEDBY = #{srf.sessioncontext.srfloginname} or t1.PO = #{srf.sessioncontext.srfloginname} or t1.RD = #{srf.sessioncontext.srfloginname} or t1.QD = #{srf.sessioncontext.srfloginname} ) UNION SELECT t1.MDEPTID, t1.orgid, t1.`ACL`, ( SELECT COUNT( 1 ) FROM ZT_BUG WHERE PRODUCT = t1.`ID` AND `STATUS` = 'active' AND DELETED = '0' ) AS `ACTIVEBUGCNT`, ( SELECT COUNT( 1 ) FROM ZT_STORY WHERE PRODUCT = t1.`ID` AND `STATUS` = 'active' AND DELETED = '0' ) AS `ACTIVESTORYCNT`, ( SELECT count( 1 ) FROM zt_build t WHERE t.product = t1.id AND t.deleted = '0' ) AS `BUILDCNT`, ( SELECT count( 1 ) FROM zt_case t WHERE t.product = t1.id AND t.deleted = '0' ) AS `CASECNT`, ( SELECT COUNT( 1 ) FROM ZT_STORY WHERE PRODUCT = t1.`ID` AND `STATUS` = 'changed' AND DELETED = '0' ) AS `CHANGEDSTORYCNT`, ( SELECT COUNT( 1 ) FROM ZT_STORY WHERE PRODUCT = t1.`ID` AND `STATUS` = 'closed' AND DELETED = '0' ) AS `CLOSEDSTORYCNT`, t1.`CODE`, t1.`CREATEDBY`, t1.`CREATEDDATE`, t1.`CREATEDVERSION`, t1.`DELETED`, ( SELECT count( 1 ) FROM zt_doc t WHERE t.product = t1.id AND t.deleted = '0' ) AS `DOCCNT`, ( SELECT COUNT( 1 ) FROM ZT_STORY WHERE PRODUCT = t1.`ID` AND `STATUS` = 'draft' AND DELETED = '0' ) AS `DRAFTSTORYCNT`, t1.`ID`, t1.`LINE`, t11.`NAME` AS `LINENAME`, t1.`NAME`, ( SELECT COUNT( 1 ) FROM ZT_BUG WHERE PRODUCT = t1.`ID` AND `STATUS` <> 'closed' AND DELETED = '0' ) AS `NOTCLOSEDBUGCNT`, t1.`ORDER`, (CASE WHEN T2.OBJECTORDER IS NOT NULL THEN T2.OBJECTORDER ELSE t1.`ORDER` END) as `ORDER1`, (CASE WHEN T2.OBJECTORDER IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as `ISTOP`, t1.`PO`, ( SELECT COUNT( 1 ) FROM ZT_PRODUCTPLAN WHERE PRODUCT = t1.`ID` AND DELETED = '0' ) AS `PRODUCTPLANCNT`, t1.`QD`, t1.`RD`, ( SELECT COUNT( 1 ) FROM ZT_BUG WHERE PRODUCT = t1.`ID` AND DELETED = '0' ) AS `RELATEDBUGCNT`, ( SELECT count( 1 ) FROM zt_projectproduct t INNER JOIN zt_project t2 ON t2.id = t.project WHERE t.product = t1.id AND t2.deleted = '0' ) AS `RELATEDPROJECTS`, ( SELECT COUNT( 1 ) FROM ZT_RELEASE WHERE PRODUCT = t1.`ID` AND DELETED = '0' ) AS `RELEASECNT`, t1.`STATUS`, t1.`SUBSTATUS`, t1.`TYPE`, ( SELECT COUNT( 1 ) FROM ZT_BUG WHERE PRODUCT = t1.`ID` AND `CONFIRMED` = 0 AND DELETED = '0' ) AS `UNCONFIRMBUGCNT` , t1.productsn FROM `zt_product` t1 left join t_ibz_top t2 on t1.id = t2.OBJECTID and t2.type = 'product' and t2.ACCOUNT = #{srf.sessioncontext.srfloginname} LEFT JOIN zt_module t11 ON t1.LINE = t11.ID WHERE t1.deleted = '0' AND t1.ID IN ( SELECT t.root from zt_team t WHERE t.account = #{srf.sessioncontext.srfloginname} AND t.type = 'product' ) ) t1

SELECT t1.`acl`, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ZT_BUG WHERE PRODUCT = t1.`id` AND `STATUS` = 'active' AND DELETED = '0' ) AS `activebugcnt`, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ZT_STORY WHERE PRODUCT = t1.`id` AND `STATUS`='active' AND DELETED = '0' and ZT_STORY.SRFDCID = t1.SRFDCID) AS `activestorycnt`, (select count(1) from zt_build t where t.product = t1.id and t.deleted = '0' ) AS `buildcnt`, (select count(1) from zt_case t where t.product = t1.id and t.deleted = '0' ) AS `casecnt`, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ZT_STORY WHERE PRODUCT = t1.`id` AND `STATUS`='changed' AND DELETED = '0' and ZT_STORY.SRFDCID = t1.SRFDCID) AS `changedstorycnt`, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ZT_STORY WHERE PRODUCT = t1.`id` AND `STATUS`='closed' AND DELETED = '0' and ZT_STORY.SRFDCID = t1.SRFDCID) AS `closedstorycnt`, t1.`code`, t1.`createdby`, t1.`createddate`, t1.`createdversion`, t1.`createman`, t1.`deleted`, (select count(1) from zt_doc t where t.product = t1.id and t.deleted = '0' and t.SRFDCID = t1.SRFDCID) AS `doccnt`, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ZT_STORY WHERE PRODUCT = t1.`id` AND `STATUS`='draft' AND DELETED = '0' and ZT_STORY.SRFDCID = t1.SRFDCID) AS `draftstorycnt`, t1.`ibiz_id`, t1.`id`, '0' AS `istop`, t1.`line`, t11.`NAME` AS `linename`, t1.`mdeptid`, t1.`mdeptname`, t1.`name`, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ZT_BUG WHERE PRODUCT = t1.`id` AND `STATUS` <> 'closed' AND DELETED = '0' and ZT_BUG.SRFDCID = t1.SRFDCID) AS `notclosedbugcnt`, t1.`order`, t1.`order` AS `order1`, t1.`orgid`, t1.`orgname`, t1.`po`, t1.PO AS `popk`, t1.`productclass`, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ZT_PRODUCTPLAN WHERE PRODUCT= t1.`id` AND DELETED = '0' and ZT_PRODUCTPLAN.SRFDCID = t1.SRFDCID) AS `productplancnt`, t1.`productsn`, t1.`qd`, t1.QD AS `qdpk`, t1.`rd`, t1.RD AS `rdpk`, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ZT_BUG WHERE PRODUCT = t1.`id` AND DELETED = '0' and ZT_BUG.SRFDCID = t1.SRFDCID) AS `relatedbugcnt`, (select count(1) from zt_projectproduct t inner join zt_project t2 on t2.id = t.project where t.product = t1.id and t2.deleted = '0' ) AS `relatedprojects`, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ZT_RELEASE WHERE PRODUCT= t1.`id` AND DELETED = '0' and ZT_RELEASE.SRFDCID = t1.SRFDCID) AS `releasecnt`, t1.`status`, t1.`substatus`, t1.`supproreport`, t1.`type`, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ZT_BUG WHERE PRODUCT = t1.`id` AND `CONFIRMED` = 0 AND DELETED = '0' and ZT_BUG.SRFDCID = t1.SRFDCID) AS `unconfirmbugcnt`, t1.`updateby`, t1.`updatedate`, t1.`updateman` FROM `zt_product` t1 LEFT JOIN `zt_module` t11 ON t1.`line` = t11.`ID`
AND t1.deleted = '0'

SELECT t1.`acl`, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ZT_BUG WHERE PRODUCT = t1.`id` AND `STATUS` = 'active' AND DELETED = '0' ) AS `activebugcnt`, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ZT_STORY WHERE PRODUCT = t1.`id` AND `STATUS`='active' AND DELETED = '0' and ZT_STORY.SRFDCID = t1.SRFDCID) AS `activestorycnt`, (select count(1) from zt_build t where t.product = t1.id and t.deleted = '0' ) AS `buildcnt`, (select count(1) from zt_case t where t.product = t1.id and t.deleted = '0' ) AS `casecnt`, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ZT_STORY WHERE PRODUCT = t1.`id` AND `STATUS`='changed' AND DELETED = '0' and ZT_STORY.SRFDCID = t1.SRFDCID) AS `changedstorycnt`, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ZT_STORY WHERE PRODUCT = t1.`id` AND `STATUS`='closed' AND DELETED = '0' and ZT_STORY.SRFDCID = t1.SRFDCID) AS `closedstorycnt`, t1.`code`, t1.`createdby`, t1.`createddate`, t1.`createdversion`, t1.`createman`, t1.`deleted`, (select count(1) from zt_doc t where t.product = t1.id and t.deleted = '0' and t.SRFDCID = t1.SRFDCID) AS `doccnt`, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ZT_STORY WHERE PRODUCT = t1.`id` AND `STATUS`='draft' AND DELETED = '0' and ZT_STORY.SRFDCID = t1.SRFDCID) AS `draftstorycnt`, t1.`ibiz_id`, t1.`id`, '0' AS `istop`, t1.`line`, t11.`NAME` AS `linename`, t1.`mdeptid`, t1.`mdeptname`, t1.`name`, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ZT_BUG WHERE PRODUCT = t1.`id` AND `STATUS` <> 'closed' AND DELETED = '0' and ZT_BUG.SRFDCID = t1.SRFDCID) AS `notclosedbugcnt`, t1.`order`, t1.`order` AS `order1`, t1.`orgid`, t1.`orgname`, t1.`po`, t1.PO AS `popk`, t1.`productclass`, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ZT_PRODUCTPLAN WHERE PRODUCT= t1.`id` AND DELETED = '0' and ZT_PRODUCTPLAN.SRFDCID = t1.SRFDCID) AS `productplancnt`, t1.`productsn`, t1.`qd`, t1.QD AS `qdpk`, t1.`rd`, t1.RD AS `rdpk`, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ZT_BUG WHERE PRODUCT = t1.`id` AND DELETED = '0' and ZT_BUG.SRFDCID = t1.SRFDCID) AS `relatedbugcnt`, (select count(1) from zt_projectproduct t inner join zt_project t2 on t2.id = t.project where t.product = t1.id and t2.deleted = '0' ) AS `relatedprojects`, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ZT_RELEASE WHERE PRODUCT= t1.`id` AND DELETED = '0' and ZT_RELEASE.SRFDCID = t1.SRFDCID) AS `releasecnt`, t1.`status`, t1.`substatus`, t1.`supproreport`, t1.`type`, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ZT_BUG WHERE PRODUCT = t1.`id` AND `CONFIRMED` = 0 AND DELETED = '0' and ZT_BUG.SRFDCID = t1.SRFDCID) AS `unconfirmbugcnt`, t1.`updateby`, t1.`updatedate`, t1.`updateman` FROM `zt_product` t1 LEFT JOIN `zt_module` t11 ON t1.`line` = t11.`ID`
AND t1.deleted = '0'
AND ( t1.id IN ( SELECT t.root from zt_team t WHERE t.account = #{srf.sessioncontext.srfloginname} AND t.type = 'product' ) )
SELECT t1.id, t1.`name`, t1.desc, t1.deleted FROM zt_product t1

SELECT t1.`acl`, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ZT_BUG WHERE PRODUCT = t1.`id` AND `STATUS` = 'active' AND DELETED = '0' ) AS `activebugcnt`, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ZT_STORY WHERE PRODUCT = t1.`id` AND `STATUS`='active' AND DELETED = '0' and ZT_STORY.SRFDCID = t1.SRFDCID) AS `activestorycnt`, (select count(1) from zt_build t where t.product = t1.id and t.deleted = '0' ) AS `buildcnt`, (select count(1) from zt_case t where t.product = t1.id and t.deleted = '0' ) AS `casecnt`, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ZT_STORY WHERE PRODUCT = t1.`id` AND `STATUS`='changed' AND DELETED = '0' and ZT_STORY.SRFDCID = t1.SRFDCID) AS `changedstorycnt`, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ZT_STORY WHERE PRODUCT = t1.`id` AND `STATUS`='closed' AND DELETED = '0' and ZT_STORY.SRFDCID = t1.SRFDCID) AS `closedstorycnt`, t1.`code`, t1.`createdby`, t1.`createddate`, t1.`createdversion`, t1.`createman`, t1.`deleted`, (select count(1) from zt_doc t where t.product = t1.id and t.deleted = '0' and t.SRFDCID = t1.SRFDCID) AS `doccnt`, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ZT_STORY WHERE PRODUCT = t1.`id` AND `STATUS`='draft' AND DELETED = '0' and ZT_STORY.SRFDCID = t1.SRFDCID) AS `draftstorycnt`, t1.`ibiz_id`, t1.`id`, '0' AS `istop`, t1.`line`, t11.`NAME` AS `linename`, t1.`mdeptid`, t1.`mdeptname`, t1.`name`, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ZT_BUG WHERE PRODUCT = t1.`id` AND `STATUS` <> 'closed' AND DELETED = '0' and ZT_BUG.SRFDCID = t1.SRFDCID) AS `notclosedbugcnt`, t1.`order`, t1.`order` AS `order1`, t1.`orgid`, t1.`orgname`, t1.`po`, t1.PO AS `popk`, t1.`productclass`, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ZT_PRODUCTPLAN WHERE PRODUCT= t1.`id` AND DELETED = '0' and ZT_PRODUCTPLAN.SRFDCID = t1.SRFDCID) AS `productplancnt`, t1.`productsn`, t1.`qd`, t1.QD AS `qdpk`, t1.`rd`, t1.RD AS `rdpk`, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ZT_BUG WHERE PRODUCT = t1.`id` AND DELETED = '0' and ZT_BUG.SRFDCID = t1.SRFDCID) AS `relatedbugcnt`, (select count(1) from zt_projectproduct t inner join zt_project t2 on t2.id = t.project where t.product = t1.id and t2.deleted = '0' ) AS `relatedprojects`, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ZT_RELEASE WHERE PRODUCT= t1.`id` AND DELETED = '0' and ZT_RELEASE.SRFDCID = t1.SRFDCID) AS `releasecnt`, t1.`status`, t1.`substatus`, t1.`supproreport`, t1.`type`, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ZT_BUG WHERE PRODUCT = t1.`id` AND `CONFIRMED` = 0 AND DELETED = '0' and ZT_BUG.SRFDCID = t1.SRFDCID) AS `unconfirmbugcnt`, t1.`updateby`, t1.`updatedate`, t1.`updateman` FROM `zt_product` t1 LEFT JOIN `zt_module` t11 ON t1.`line` = t11.`ID`
AND t1.deleted = '0'
AND ( t1.`acl` = 'open' )

SELECT t1.`acl`, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ZT_BUG WHERE PRODUCT = t1.`id` AND `STATUS` = 'active' AND DELETED = '0' ) AS `activebugcnt`, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ZT_STORY WHERE PRODUCT = t1.`id` AND `STATUS`='active' AND DELETED = '0' and ZT_STORY.SRFDCID = t1.SRFDCID) AS `activestorycnt`, (select count(1) from zt_build t where t.product = t1.id and t.deleted = '0' ) AS `buildcnt`, (select count(1) from zt_case t where t.product = t1.id and t.deleted = '0' ) AS `casecnt`, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ZT_STORY WHERE PRODUCT = t1.`id` AND `STATUS`='changed' AND DELETED = '0' and ZT_STORY.SRFDCID = t1.SRFDCID) AS `changedstorycnt`, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ZT_STORY WHERE PRODUCT = t1.`id` AND `STATUS`='closed' AND DELETED = '0' and ZT_STORY.SRFDCID = t1.SRFDCID) AS `closedstorycnt`, t1.`code`, t1.`createdby`, t1.`createddate`, t1.`createdversion`, t1.`createman`, t1.`deleted`, (select count(1) from zt_doc t where t.product = t1.id and t.deleted = '0' and t.SRFDCID = t1.SRFDCID) AS `doccnt`, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ZT_STORY WHERE PRODUCT = t1.`id` AND `STATUS`='draft' AND DELETED = '0' and ZT_STORY.SRFDCID = t1.SRFDCID) AS `draftstorycnt`, t1.`ibiz_id`, t1.`id`, '0' AS `istop`, t1.`line`, t11.`NAME` AS `linename`, t1.`mdeptid`, t1.`mdeptname`, t1.`name`, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ZT_BUG WHERE PRODUCT = t1.`id` AND `STATUS` <> 'closed' AND DELETED = '0' and ZT_BUG.SRFDCID = t1.SRFDCID) AS `notclosedbugcnt`, t1.`order`, t1.`order` AS `order1`, t1.`orgid`, t1.`orgname`, t1.`po`, t1.PO AS `popk`, t1.`productclass`, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ZT_PRODUCTPLAN WHERE PRODUCT= t1.`id` AND DELETED = '0' and ZT_PRODUCTPLAN.SRFDCID = t1.SRFDCID) AS `productplancnt`, t1.`productsn`, t1.`qd`, t1.QD AS `qdpk`, t1.`rd`, t1.RD AS `rdpk`, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ZT_BUG WHERE PRODUCT = t1.`id` AND DELETED = '0' and ZT_BUG.SRFDCID = t1.SRFDCID) AS `relatedbugcnt`, (select count(1) from zt_projectproduct t inner join zt_project t2 on t2.id = t.project where t.product = t1.id and t2.deleted = '0' ) AS `relatedprojects`, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ZT_RELEASE WHERE PRODUCT= t1.`id` AND DELETED = '0' and ZT_RELEASE.SRFDCID = t1.SRFDCID) AS `releasecnt`, t1.`status`, t1.`substatus`, t1.`supproreport`, t1.`type`, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ZT_BUG WHERE PRODUCT = t1.`id` AND `CONFIRMED` = 0 AND DELETED = '0' and ZT_BUG.SRFDCID = t1.SRFDCID) AS `unconfirmbugcnt`, t1.`updateby`, t1.`updatedate`, t1.`updateman` FROM `zt_product` t1 LEFT JOIN `zt_module` t11 ON t1.`line` = t11.`ID`
AND t1.deleted = '0'
AND ( t1.`po` = #{srf.sessioncontext.srfloginname} )

SELECT t1.`acl`, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ZT_BUG WHERE PRODUCT = t1.`id` AND `STATUS` = 'active' AND DELETED = '0' ) AS `activebugcnt`, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ZT_STORY WHERE PRODUCT = t1.`id` AND `STATUS`='active' AND DELETED = '0' and ZT_STORY.SRFDCID = t1.SRFDCID) AS `activestorycnt`, (select count(1) from zt_build t where t.product = t1.id and t.deleted = '0' ) AS `buildcnt`, (select count(1) from zt_case t where t.product = t1.id and t.deleted = '0' ) AS `casecnt`, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ZT_STORY WHERE PRODUCT = t1.`id` AND `STATUS`='changed' AND DELETED = '0' and ZT_STORY.SRFDCID = t1.SRFDCID) AS `changedstorycnt`, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ZT_STORY WHERE PRODUCT = t1.`id` AND `STATUS`='closed' AND DELETED = '0' and ZT_STORY.SRFDCID = t1.SRFDCID) AS `closedstorycnt`, t1.`code`, t1.`createdby`, t1.`createddate`, t1.`createdversion`, t1.`createman`, t1.`deleted`, (select count(1) from zt_doc t where t.product = t1.id and t.deleted = '0' and t.SRFDCID = t1.SRFDCID) AS `doccnt`, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ZT_STORY WHERE PRODUCT = t1.`id` AND `STATUS`='draft' AND DELETED = '0' and ZT_STORY.SRFDCID = t1.SRFDCID) AS `draftstorycnt`, t1.`ibiz_id`, t1.`id`, '0' AS `istop`, t1.`line`, t11.`NAME` AS `linename`, t1.`mdeptid`, t1.`mdeptname`, t1.`name`, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ZT_BUG WHERE PRODUCT = t1.`id` AND `STATUS` <> 'closed' AND DELETED = '0' and ZT_BUG.SRFDCID = t1.SRFDCID) AS `notclosedbugcnt`, t1.`order`, t1.`order` AS `order1`, t1.`orgid`, t1.`orgname`, t1.`po`, t1.PO AS `popk`, t1.`productclass`, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ZT_PRODUCTPLAN WHERE PRODUCT= t1.`id` AND DELETED = '0' and ZT_PRODUCTPLAN.SRFDCID = t1.SRFDCID) AS `productplancnt`, t1.`productsn`, t1.`qd`, t1.QD AS `qdpk`, t1.`rd`, t1.RD AS `rdpk`, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ZT_BUG WHERE PRODUCT = t1.`id` AND DELETED = '0' and ZT_BUG.SRFDCID = t1.SRFDCID) AS `relatedbugcnt`, (select count(1) from zt_projectproduct t inner join zt_project t2 on t2.id = t.project where t.product = t1.id and t2.deleted = '0' ) AS `relatedprojects`, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ZT_RELEASE WHERE PRODUCT= t1.`id` AND DELETED = '0' and ZT_RELEASE.SRFDCID = t1.SRFDCID) AS `releasecnt`, t1.`status`, t1.`substatus`, t1.`supproreport`, t1.`type`, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ZT_BUG WHERE PRODUCT = t1.`id` AND `CONFIRMED` = 0 AND DELETED = '0' and ZT_BUG.SRFDCID = t1.SRFDCID) AS `unconfirmbugcnt`, t1.`updateby`, t1.`updatedate`, t1.`updateman` FROM `zt_product` t1 LEFT JOIN `zt_module` t11 ON t1.`line` = t11.`ID`
AND t1.deleted = '0'
AND ( ( t1.`acl` = 'private' AND t1.`createdby` = #{srf.sessioncontext.srfloginname} ) )

select t1.* FROM (select t.`status`, count(t.id) as SRFCOUNT from zt_product t where t.`status` <> '' and t.`status` is not null and t.deleted = '0' and t.orgid = #{srf.sessioncontext.srforgid} GROUP BY t.`status`) t1

SELECT t1.`ACL`, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ZT_BUG WHERE PRODUCT = t1.`ID` AND `STATUS` = 'active' AND DELETED = '0') AS `ACTIVEBUGCNT`, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ZT_STORY WHERE PRODUCT = t1.`ID` AND `STATUS`='active' AND DELETED = '0') AS `ACTIVESTORYCNT`, (select count(1) from zt_build t where t.product = t1.id and t.deleted = '0') AS `BUILDCNT`, (select count(1) from zt_case t where t.product = t1.id and t.deleted = '0') AS `CASECNT`, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ZT_STORY WHERE PRODUCT = t1.`ID` AND `STATUS`='changed' AND DELETED = '0') AS `CHANGEDSTORYCNT`, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ZT_STORY WHERE PRODUCT = t1.`ID` AND `STATUS`='closed' AND DELETED = '0') AS `CLOSEDSTORYCNT`, t1.`CODE`, t1.`CREATEDBY`, t1.`CREATEDDATE`, t1.`CREATEDVERSION`, t1.`DELETED`, (select count(1) from zt_doc t where t.product = t1.id and t.deleted = '0') AS `DOCCNT`, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ZT_STORY WHERE PRODUCT = t1.`ID` AND `STATUS`='draft' AND DELETED = '0') AS `DRAFTSTORYCNT`, t1.`IBIZ_ID`, t1.`ID`, '0' AS `ISTOP`, t1.`LINE`, t11.`NAME` AS `LINENAME`, t1.`MDEPTID`, t1.`NAME`, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ZT_BUG WHERE PRODUCT = t1.`ID` AND `STATUS` <> 'closed' AND DELETED = '0') AS `NOTCLOSEDBUGCNT`, t1.`ORDER`, t1.`order` AS `ORDER1`, t1.`ORGID`, t1.`PO`, t1.PO AS `POPK`, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ZT_PRODUCTPLAN WHERE PRODUCT= t1.`ID` AND DELETED = '0') AS `PRODUCTPLANCNT`, t1.`QD`, t1.QD AS `QDPK`, t1.`RD`, t1.RD AS `RDPK`, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ZT_BUG WHERE PRODUCT = t1.`ID` AND DELETED = '0') AS `RELATEDBUGCNT`, (select count(1) from zt_projectproduct t inner join zt_project t2 on t2.id = t.project where t.product = t1.id and t2.deleted = '0') AS `RELATEDPROJECTS`, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ZT_RELEASE WHERE PRODUCT= t1.`ID` AND DELETED = '0') AS `RELEASECNT`, t1.`STATUS`, t1.`SUBSTATUS`, t1.`TYPE`, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ZT_BUG WHERE PRODUCT = t1.`ID` AND `CONFIRMED` = 0 AND DELETED = '0') AS `UNCONFIRMBUGCNT`, t1.productsn FROM `zt_product` t1 LEFT JOIN zt_module t11 ON t1.LINE = t11.id
AND t1.DELETED = '0'
AND t21.type = 'product'
AND t21.account = #{srf.sessioncontext.srfloginname}

SELECT t1.`acl`, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ZT_BUG WHERE PRODUCT = t1.`id` AND `STATUS` = 'active' AND DELETED = '0' ) AS `activebugcnt`, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ZT_STORY WHERE PRODUCT = t1.`id` AND `STATUS`='active' AND DELETED = '0' and ZT_STORY.SRFDCID = t1.SRFDCID) AS `activestorycnt`, (select count(1) from zt_build t where t.product = t1.id and t.deleted = '0' ) AS `buildcnt`, (select count(1) from zt_case t where t.product = t1.id and t.deleted = '0' ) AS `casecnt`, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ZT_STORY WHERE PRODUCT = t1.`id` AND `STATUS`='changed' AND DELETED = '0' and ZT_STORY.SRFDCID = t1.SRFDCID) AS `changedstorycnt`, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ZT_STORY WHERE PRODUCT = t1.`id` AND `STATUS`='closed' AND DELETED = '0' and ZT_STORY.SRFDCID = t1.SRFDCID) AS `closedstorycnt`, t1.`code`, t1.`createdby`, t1.`createddate`, t1.`createdversion`, t1.`createman`, t1.`deleted`, (select count(1) from zt_doc t where t.product = t1.id and t.deleted = '0' and t.SRFDCID = t1.SRFDCID) AS `doccnt`, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ZT_STORY WHERE PRODUCT = t1.`id` AND `STATUS`='draft' AND DELETED = '0' and ZT_STORY.SRFDCID = t1.SRFDCID) AS `draftstorycnt`, t1.`ibiz_id`, t1.`id`, '0' AS `istop`, t1.`line`, t11.`NAME` AS `linename`, t1.`mdeptid`, t1.`mdeptname`, t1.`name`, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ZT_BUG WHERE PRODUCT = t1.`id` AND `STATUS` <> 'closed' AND DELETED = '0' and ZT_BUG.SRFDCID = t1.SRFDCID) AS `notclosedbugcnt`, t1.`order`, t1.`order` AS `order1`, t1.`orgid`, t1.`orgname`, t1.`po`, t1.PO AS `popk`, t1.`productclass`, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ZT_PRODUCTPLAN WHERE PRODUCT= t1.`id` AND DELETED = '0' and ZT_PRODUCTPLAN.SRFDCID = t1.SRFDCID) AS `productplancnt`, t1.`productsn`, t1.`qd`, t1.QD AS `qdpk`, t1.`rd`, t1.RD AS `rdpk`, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ZT_BUG WHERE PRODUCT = t1.`id` AND DELETED = '0' and ZT_BUG.SRFDCID = t1.SRFDCID) AS `relatedbugcnt`, (select count(1) from zt_projectproduct t inner join zt_project t2 on t2.id = t.project where t.product = t1.id and t2.deleted = '0' ) AS `relatedprojects`, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ZT_RELEASE WHERE PRODUCT= t1.`id` AND DELETED = '0' and ZT_RELEASE.SRFDCID = t1.SRFDCID) AS `releasecnt`, t1.`status`, t1.`substatus`, t1.`supproreport`, t1.`type`, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ZT_BUG WHERE PRODUCT = t1.`id` AND `CONFIRMED` = 0 AND DELETED = '0' and ZT_BUG.SRFDCID = t1.SRFDCID) AS `unconfirmbugcnt`, t1.`updateby`, t1.`updatedate`, t1.`updateman` FROM `zt_product` t1 LEFT JOIN `zt_module` t11 ON t1.`line` = t11.`ID`
AND t1.deleted = '0'
AND ( t1.`qd` = #{srf.sessioncontext.srfloginname} )

SELECT t1.`acl`, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ZT_BUG WHERE PRODUCT = t1.`id` AND `STATUS` = 'active' AND DELETED = '0' ) AS `activebugcnt`, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ZT_STORY WHERE PRODUCT = t1.`id` AND `STATUS`='active' AND DELETED = '0' and ZT_STORY.SRFDCID = t1.SRFDCID) AS `activestorycnt`, (select count(1) from zt_build t where t.product = t1.id and t.deleted = '0' ) AS `buildcnt`, (select count(1) from zt_case t where t.product = t1.id and t.deleted = '0' ) AS `casecnt`, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ZT_STORY WHERE PRODUCT = t1.`id` AND `STATUS`='changed' AND DELETED = '0' and ZT_STORY.SRFDCID = t1.SRFDCID) AS `changedstorycnt`, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ZT_STORY WHERE PRODUCT = t1.`id` AND `STATUS`='closed' AND DELETED = '0' and ZT_STORY.SRFDCID = t1.SRFDCID) AS `closedstorycnt`, t1.`code`, t1.`createdby`, t1.`createddate`, t1.`createdversion`, t1.`createman`, t1.`deleted`, (select count(1) from zt_doc t where t.product = t1.id and t.deleted = '0' and t.SRFDCID = t1.SRFDCID) AS `doccnt`, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ZT_STORY WHERE PRODUCT = t1.`id` AND `STATUS`='draft' AND DELETED = '0' and ZT_STORY.SRFDCID = t1.SRFDCID) AS `draftstorycnt`, t1.`ibiz_id`, t1.`id`, '0' AS `istop`, t1.`line`, t11.`NAME` AS `linename`, t1.`mdeptid`, t1.`mdeptname`, t1.`name`, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ZT_BUG WHERE PRODUCT = t1.`id` AND `STATUS` <> 'closed' AND DELETED = '0' and ZT_BUG.SRFDCID = t1.SRFDCID) AS `notclosedbugcnt`, t1.`order`, t1.`order` AS `order1`, t1.`orgid`, t1.`orgname`, t1.`po`, t1.PO AS `popk`, t1.`productclass`, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ZT_PRODUCTPLAN WHERE PRODUCT= t1.`id` AND DELETED = '0' and ZT_PRODUCTPLAN.SRFDCID = t1.SRFDCID) AS `productplancnt`, t1.`productsn`, t1.`qd`, t1.QD AS `qdpk`, t1.`rd`, t1.RD AS `rdpk`, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ZT_BUG WHERE PRODUCT = t1.`id` AND DELETED = '0' and ZT_BUG.SRFDCID = t1.SRFDCID) AS `relatedbugcnt`, (select count(1) from zt_projectproduct t inner join zt_project t2 on t2.id = t.project where t.product = t1.id and t2.deleted = '0' ) AS `relatedprojects`, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ZT_RELEASE WHERE PRODUCT= t1.`id` AND DELETED = '0' and ZT_RELEASE.SRFDCID = t1.SRFDCID) AS `releasecnt`, t1.`status`, t1.`substatus`, t1.`supproreport`, t1.`type`, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ZT_BUG WHERE PRODUCT = t1.`id` AND `CONFIRMED` = 0 AND DELETED = '0' and ZT_BUG.SRFDCID = t1.SRFDCID) AS `unconfirmbugcnt`, t1.`updateby`, t1.`updatedate`, t1.`updateman` FROM `zt_product` t1 LEFT JOIN `zt_module` t11 ON t1.`line` = t11.`ID`
AND t1.deleted = '0'
AND ( t1.`rd` = #{srf.sessioncontext.srfloginname} )

SELECT t1.`createdby`, t1.`createddate`, t1.`createman`, t1.`deleted`, t1.`id`, '0' AS `istop`, t1.`mdeptid`, t1.`mdeptname`, t1.`name`, t1.`orgid`, t1.`orgname`, t1.`status`, t1.`updateby`, t1.`updatedate`, t1.`updateman` FROM `zt_product` t1
AND t1.deleted = '0'

SELECT t1.`acl`, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ZT_BUG WHERE PRODUCT = t1.`id` AND `STATUS` = 'active' AND DELETED = '0' ) AS `activebugcnt`, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ZT_STORY WHERE PRODUCT = t1.`id` AND `STATUS`='active' AND DELETED = '0' and ZT_STORY.SRFDCID = t1.SRFDCID) AS `activestorycnt`, (select count(1) from zt_build t where t.product = t1.id and t.deleted = '0' ) AS `buildcnt`, (select count(1) from zt_case t where t.product = t1.id and t.deleted = '0' ) AS `casecnt`, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ZT_STORY WHERE PRODUCT = t1.`id` AND `STATUS`='changed' AND DELETED = '0' and ZT_STORY.SRFDCID = t1.SRFDCID) AS `changedstorycnt`, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ZT_STORY WHERE PRODUCT = t1.`id` AND `STATUS`='closed' AND DELETED = '0' and ZT_STORY.SRFDCID = t1.SRFDCID) AS `closedstorycnt`, t1.`code`, t1.`createdby`, t1.`createddate`, t1.`createdversion`, t1.`createman`, t1.`deleted`, (select count(1) from zt_doc t where t.product = t1.id and t.deleted = '0' and t.SRFDCID = t1.SRFDCID) AS `doccnt`, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ZT_STORY WHERE PRODUCT = t1.`id` AND `STATUS`='draft' AND DELETED = '0' and ZT_STORY.SRFDCID = t1.SRFDCID) AS `draftstorycnt`, t1.`ibiz_id`, t1.`id`, '0' AS `istop`, t1.`line`, t11.`NAME` AS `linename`, t1.`mdeptid`, t1.`mdeptname`, t1.`name`, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ZT_BUG WHERE PRODUCT = t1.`id` AND `STATUS` <> 'closed' AND DELETED = '0' and ZT_BUG.SRFDCID = t1.SRFDCID) AS `notclosedbugcnt`, t1.`order`, t1.`order` AS `order1`, t1.`orgid`, t1.`orgname`, t1.`po`, t1.PO AS `popk`, t1.`productclass`, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ZT_PRODUCTPLAN WHERE PRODUCT= t1.`id` AND DELETED = '0' and ZT_PRODUCTPLAN.SRFDCID = t1.SRFDCID) AS `productplancnt`, t1.`productsn`, t1.`qd`, t1.QD AS `qdpk`, t1.`rd`, t1.RD AS `rdpk`, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ZT_BUG WHERE PRODUCT = t1.`id` AND DELETED = '0' and ZT_BUG.SRFDCID = t1.SRFDCID) AS `relatedbugcnt`, (select count(1) from zt_projectproduct t inner join zt_project t2 on t2.id = t.project where t.product = t1.id and t2.deleted = '0' ) AS `relatedprojects`, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ZT_RELEASE WHERE PRODUCT= t1.`id` AND DELETED = '0' and ZT_RELEASE.SRFDCID = t1.SRFDCID) AS `releasecnt`, t1.`status`, t1.`substatus`, t1.`supproreport`, t1.`type`, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ZT_BUG WHERE PRODUCT = t1.`id` AND `CONFIRMED` = 0 AND DELETED = '0' and ZT_BUG.SRFDCID = t1.SRFDCID) AS `unconfirmbugcnt`, t1.`updateby`, t1.`updatedate`, t1.`updateman` FROM `zt_product` t1 LEFT JOIN `zt_module` t11 ON t1.`line` = t11.`ID`
AND EXISTS(SELECT * FROM `zt_projectproduct` t21 WHERE t1.`id` = t21.`PRODUCT` AND ( t21.`PROJECT` = #{srf.datacontext.project} ) )
AND t1.deleted = '0'

SELECT t1.`acl`, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ZT_BUG WHERE PRODUCT = t1.`id` AND `STATUS` = 'active' AND DELETED = '0' ) AS `activebugcnt`, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ZT_STORY WHERE PRODUCT = t1.`id` AND `STATUS`='active' AND DELETED = '0' and ZT_STORY.SRFDCID = t1.SRFDCID) AS `activestorycnt`, (select count(1) from zt_build t where t.product = t1.id and t.deleted = '0' ) AS `buildcnt`, (select count(1) from zt_case t where t.product = t1.id and t.deleted = '0' ) AS `casecnt`, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ZT_STORY WHERE PRODUCT = t1.`id` AND `STATUS`='changed' AND DELETED = '0' and ZT_STORY.SRFDCID = t1.SRFDCID) AS `changedstorycnt`, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ZT_STORY WHERE PRODUCT = t1.`id` AND `STATUS`='closed' AND DELETED = '0' and ZT_STORY.SRFDCID = t1.SRFDCID) AS `closedstorycnt`, t1.`code`, t1.`createdby`, t1.`createddate`, t1.`createdversion`, t1.`createman`, t1.`deleted`, t1.`desc`, (select count(1) from zt_doc t where t.product = t1.id and t.deleted = '0' and t.SRFDCID = t1.SRFDCID) AS `doccnt`, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ZT_STORY WHERE PRODUCT = t1.`id` AND `STATUS`='draft' AND DELETED = '0' and ZT_STORY.SRFDCID = t1.SRFDCID) AS `draftstorycnt`, t1.`ibiz_id`, t1.`id`, '0' AS `istop`, t1.`line`, t11.`NAME` AS `linename`, t1.`mdeptid`, t1.`mdeptname`, t1.`name`, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ZT_BUG WHERE PRODUCT = t1.`id` AND `STATUS` <> 'closed' AND DELETED = '0' and ZT_BUG.SRFDCID = t1.SRFDCID) AS `notclosedbugcnt`, t1.`order`, t1.`order` AS `order1`, t1.`orgid`, t1.`orgname`, t1.`po`, t1.PO AS `popk`, t1.`productclass`, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ZT_PRODUCTPLAN WHERE PRODUCT= t1.`id` AND DELETED = '0' and ZT_PRODUCTPLAN.SRFDCID = t1.SRFDCID) AS `productplancnt`, t1.`productsn`, t1.`qd`, t1.QD AS `qdpk`, t1.`rd`, t1.RD AS `rdpk`, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ZT_BUG WHERE PRODUCT = t1.`id` AND DELETED = '0' and ZT_BUG.SRFDCID = t1.SRFDCID) AS `relatedbugcnt`, (select count(1) from zt_projectproduct t inner join zt_project t2 on t2.id = t.project where t.product = t1.id and t2.deleted = '0' ) AS `relatedprojects`, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ZT_RELEASE WHERE PRODUCT= t1.`id` AND DELETED = '0' and ZT_RELEASE.SRFDCID = t1.SRFDCID) AS `releasecnt`, t1.`status`, t1.`substatus`, t1.`supproreport`, t1.`type`, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ZT_BUG WHERE PRODUCT = t1.`id` AND `CONFIRMED` = 0 AND DELETED = '0' and ZT_BUG.SRFDCID = t1.SRFDCID) AS `unconfirmbugcnt`, t1.`updateby`, t1.`updatedate`, t1.`updateman`, t1.`whitelist` FROM `zt_product` t1 LEFT JOIN `zt_module` t11 ON t1.`line` = t11.`ID`
AND t1.deleted = '0'
